535180.name: Fantasy Grounds - 50 Fathom's Player's Guide (Savage Worlds)
535180.description:
Savage Worlds: 50 Fathoms Player's Guide

Player Specific Library Module for Fantasy Grounds II
The people of Caribdus are adapting to their wet new world. Crab-like scurillians, massive grael, lonely doreen, mysterious kraken, cruel kehana, and the near-human masaquani now sail the seas aside the new visitors, humans from the age of piracy, dashing corsairs, bloodthirsty bucaneers, and savage sea dogs drawn from the mists of earth on unfamiliar tides. Many believe these visitors to be destined to defeat the Sea Hags and save Caribdus from a watery grave, but most seem interested only in joining the plunder of forgotten treasures in a drowning world.
This new Explorer's Size edition of the classic and much-loved 50 Fathoms includes the updated text of the original game, plus the 50 Fathoms Companion, all compatible with Savage Worlds Deluxe and beautifully colored by three-time Hugo Award winning artist Cheyenne Wright!
The 50 Fathom's Player's Guide is not a complete game. You need a gamemaster running
the Savage Worlds ruleset. Player's Guides provide the first section of each Savage Settings and let players get all the information they need without revealing any GM secrets.
What You Get
  • 50 Fathoms Player Guide module
  • Custom extension
  • A load of new Edges, hindrances, equipment, setting info and everything you need to be a player in 50 Fathoms.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the latest Savage Worlds
Ruleset for off-line viewing. A Lite license will work when connected to an Ultimate or Full license host running 50 Fathoms.
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Kevin Doswell
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
